head.citation-title: Preprocessing methods for SVD-based iris recognition
head.abstracts: In this paper, we compare the performance of singular value decomposition for the recognition of human irises after image preprocessing by quaternion transformation and colour levelling based on contour detection. The results are also compared with our previous approach based on classic iris unfolding. ©2010 IEEE.
